department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering (ECE Department) requires 10 Turtlebot4 mobile robot platforms
description: The Royal Military College of Canada (RMC) requires the supply and delivery of 10 Turtlebot4 mobile robot platforms to fulfill the educational requirements of the ECE Department.
full_summary:
Tender for Research Robot Systems
=====================================

**Reference Number: WS4414743331-Doc4422764236**

**Publication Date:** January 31, 2024

**Submission Deadline:** February 15, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. EST

**Commodity Price Notice:**

A modification has been made to the submission deadline for the supply and delivery of research robot systems to the Royal Military College of Canada's Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering. All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by 2:00 p.m. EST on February 15, 2024. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

**Requirements:**

The Department requires the supply and delivery of ten (10) Turtlebot4 mobile robot platforms to support educational requirements.

**Delivery Details:**

Delivery shall be made by March 28, 2024.

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Procedure:** Competitive Open Bidding

**Evaluation Criteria:**

Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Procurement Category:**

Goods and Services (GD)

**Trade Agreements:**

The contract adheres to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Contact Information:**

For further information or clarification, please contact:

* Nathalie Longtin, Contracting Officer, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Email: [nathalie.longtin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nathalie.longtin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL:**

The tender notice is available on [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18670480?extsite=MTg2NzA0ODBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18670480?extsite=MTg2NzA0ODBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
